info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 5:54PM CDT until May 19 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR PERRY COUNTY... At 552 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Percy, or 10 miles west of Pinckneyville, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 549 PM 73 mph winds were reported in Cutler. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Pinckneyville around 600 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Tamaroa. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southern and south central Illinois.
